languages.text: "Мы с отрядом перевяжем раны, перегруппируемся и будем прорываться к своему шаттлу. Последнее рекомендую без промедлений сделать и вам".
"My squad and I will dress our wounds, regroup, then try to break through to our shuttle. I recommend you do that last part as well, and soon."
languages.original_text: "Мы с отрядом перевяжем раны, перегруппируемся и будем прорываться к своему шаттлу. Последнее рекомендую без промедлений сделать и вам".

traits.locale_text: "My squad and I will dress our wounds, regroup, then try to break through to our shuttle. I recommend you do that last part yourself, and soon."
"My squad and I will dress our wounds, regroup, then try to break through to our shuttle. I recommend you do that last part yourself, and soon."
"My squad and I will dress our wounds, regroup, then try to break through to our shuttle. I recommend you do that last part as well, and soon."
"My squad and I will dress our wounds, regroup, then try to break through to our shuttle. I recommend you do that last part as well, and soon."
"My squad and I will dress our wounds, regroup, then try to break through to our shuttle. I recommend you do that last part as well, and soon."
"My squad and I will dress our wounds, regroup, then try to break through to our shuttle. I recommend you do that last part as well, and soon."

languages.text: "Wir werden unsere Wunden versorgen, uns neu formieren und versuchen, zu unserem Shuttle durchzubrechen. Ich rate Euch, dasselbe zu tun ... schnell."
languages.original_text: "My squad and I will dress our wounds, regroup, then try to break through to our shuttle. I recommend you do that last part as well, and soon."

traits.locale_text: "Wir werden unsere Wunden versorgen, uns neu formieren und versuchen, zu unserem Shuttle durchzubrechen. Ich rate Euch, dasselbe zu tun ... schnell."

languages.text: « Mon escouade et moi allons panser nos blessures, nous regrouper, puis tenter de nous frayer un chemin jusqu'à notre navette. Je vous recommande d'en faire autant sans délai. »
languages.original_text: "My squad and I will dress our wounds, regroup, then try to break through to our shuttle. I recommend you do that last part as well, and soon."

traits.locale_text: « Mon escouade et moi allons panser nos blessures, nous regrouper, puis tenter de nous frayer un chemin jusqu'à notre navette. Je vous recommande d'en faire autant sans délai. »

languages.text: «Mi escuadra y yo nos vendaremos las heridas, nos reagruparemos y luego intentaremos llegar a nuestra lanzadera. Le recomiendo que haga usted también lo último, y sin demora».
languages.original_text: "My squad and I will dress our wounds, regroup, then try to break through to our shuttle. I recommend you do that last part as well, and soon."

traits.locale_text: «Mi escuadra y yo nos vendaremos las heridas, nos reagruparemos y luego intentaremos llegar a nuestra lanzadera. Le recomiendo que haga usted también lo último, y sin demora».

languages.text: “我和我的队员会包扎伤口，重整旗鼓，之后会努力突破敌军包围，抵达我们的穿梭机。我建议你也马上赶往穿梭机，越快越好。”
languages.original_text: "My squad and I will dress our wounds, regroup, then try to break through to our shuttle. I recommend you do that last part as well, and soon."

traits.locale_text: “我和我的队员会包扎伤口，重整旗鼓，之后会努力突破敌军包围，抵达我们的穿梭机。我建议你也马上赶往穿梭机，越快越好。”

languages.text: 「私の部隊は傷を治して態勢を整えたら、シャトルまで突っ切ります。あなたも、できるだけ早く脱出することをお勧めします」
languages.original_text: "My squad and I will dress our wounds, regroup, then try to break through to our shuttle. I recommend you do that last part as well, and soon."

traits.locale_text: 「私の部隊は傷を治して態勢を整えたら、シャトルまで突っ切ります。あなたも、できるだけ早く脱出することをお勧めします」

languages.text: "Adamlarımla yaralarımızı tedavi edip toparlanacağız. Ardından düşmanları yararak mekiğimize ulaşmaya çalışacağız. Çok vakit kaybetmeden sizin de mekiğinize dönmenizi öneririm."
languages.original_text: "My squad and I will dress our wounds, regroup, then try to break through to our shuttle. I recommend you do that last part as well, and soon."

traits.locale_text: "Adamlarımla yaralarımızı tedavi edip toparlanacağız. Ardından düşmanları yararak mekiğimize ulaşmaya çalışacağız. Çok vakit kaybetmeden sizin de mekiğinize dönmenizi öneririm."
